mapper.select: SELECT id, cart_list_id AS cartListId, item_id AS itemId, item_count AS itemCount, is_hold AS isHold, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM cart WHERE cart_list_id = #{cartListId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart ( cart_list_id, item_id, item_count, is_hold, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{cartListId}, #{itemId}, #{itemCount}, #{isHold}, #{updatedAt} )
